article_title: Two Women Facing Substance Charges in Kemper County
article_text:
Kemper County authorities have charged two women with fraudulently obtaining a controlled substance.

The Kemper County Sheriff's Department says Teresa Boyd of Scooba and Viola Green of Meridian are charged with trying to fraudulently obtain a controlled substance.

Bond for each suspect was set at $2,500 and both have bonded out of jail.
